snippet.title: Until Then - Official Release Date Trailer | The MIX x Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2024
snippet.description: In this latest trailer for Until Then, explore more of the gorgeous pixel-art world of the upcoming side-scrolling, cinematic, narrative adventure game set in Philippines-inspired landscapes. Additionally, learn more about the story and get a hint at the mysteries that await. Until Then will be available on PC and PS5 (PlayStation 5) on May 23, 2024. A fateful meeting sets off a chain reaction, upending Mark's life. People disappear and memories prove unreliable. Uncover a hidden truth with Mark and his friends in this narrative adventure and race to unravel the mystery before it's too late.
